amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that active military personnel that either live in or are stationed in Washington, DC, would be exempt from existing District of Columbia firearms restrictions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in House Report 112-485, to express the sense of Congress that active military personnel that either live in or are stationed in Washington, DC, would be exempt from existing District of Columbia firearms restrictions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Gingrey (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
